data.homeworkTitle: 第二章第一节常见症状体征的护理

questions.title: 排除痰液的护理措施，下列哪项不妥
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"限制水分摄入，以免痰液生成","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"痰黏稠可使用祛痰剂","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"对症使用有效的中成药","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"施行蒸气吸入或药物超声雾化吸入","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"对痰多而无力咳出者助以翻身拍背或导管插入吸痰","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 对咳嗽、咳痰患者，护理措施错误的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"保持室内空气新鲜，温、湿度适宜","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"咳脓痰者注意口腔护理","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"痰稠不易咳出，鼓励多饮水，施行雾化吸入","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"痰多可在饭后行体位引流，痰多且无力咳出者","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"帮助翻身拍背","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 吸气性呼吸困难严重者可出现三凹征，三凹征是指
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"胸骨上窝．锁骨上窝和肋间隙在吸气时明显下陷","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"胸骨上窝．锁骨上窝和肋间隙在呼气时明显下陷","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"胸骨上窝．锁骨下窝和肋间隙在吸气时明显下陷","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"胸骨下窝．锁骨上窝和肋间隙在吸气时明显下陷","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"胸骨上窝．锁骨下窝和肋间隙在呼气时明显下陷","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 对痰液过多且无力咳嗽者，为防止窒息，在翻身前护士首先应
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"给病人吸氧","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"给病人吸痰","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"慢慢移动病人","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"给病人拍背","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"指导病人有效咳嗽","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 引起呼吸系统疾病最常见的病因是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"肿瘤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"理化因素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"感染","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"变态反应","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"吸烟","IsAnswer":false}]
